description: This file defines the root layout and main components of a React application built with Remix. It sets up page head metadata, styles, navigation, sidebar, and the main layout structure including header and footer. It also includes functions for linking stylesheets and setting document metadata.

methods.name: links
methods.description: Defines external stylesheets and preconnect links used in the document head.

methods.name: meta
methods.description: Provides metadata information such as page title, description, and theme color.

methods.name: AppHeader
methods.description: React component rendering the application header with title and navigation links.

methods.name: AppSidebar
methods.description: React component rendering the sidebar with navigation and filters.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: Main layout component wrapping page content with header, sidebar, and footer.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main component rendering the outlet for nested routes.
